SubsurfaceProfile: SubsurfaceProfile, for Screen Space Subsurface Scattering..
NeuralProfile: Neural network profile. For internal usage, not editable/visible
LightmassSettings: The Lightmass settings for this object.
AssetUserData: Array of user data stored with the asset
PreviewMesh: The mesh used by the material editor to preview the material.
AssetImportData: Importing data and options used for this material

methods.name: GetBaseMaterial
methods.doc: Walks up parent chain and finds the base Material that this is an instance of. Just calls the virtual GetMaterial()

methods.name: GetNaniteOverideMaterial
methods.doc: Get the associated nanite override material.

methods.name: GetPhysicalMaterial
methods.doc:
Return a pointer to the physical material used by this material instance.
@return The physical material.

methods.name: GetPhysicalMaterialFromMap
methods.doc:
Return a pointer to the physical material from mask map at given index.
@return The physical material.

methods.name: GetPhysicalMaterialMask
methods.doc:
Return a pointer to the physical material mask used by this material instance.
@return The physical material.

methods.name: SetForceMipLevelsToBeResident
